column1: Bavette's Bar & Boeuf////Let's see: In sum
column5: I like the pacing (never too rushed)
column7: and I was very appreciative of the fact that they gave us a 4-top table
column8: but at this price point I probably won't go back unless I'm on an expense account
column9: and so we're thinking of cancelling the reservation for my upcoming birthday bash in favor of one of the other
